name: Dread Shadows
description:
This is Dread Shadows, a game we made for the Ludum Dare 51 challenge with the theme "Every 10 Seconds". 

You are an explorer searching for the treasure room containing one of the legendary Crystal Skulls. Apparently the tomb you entered is cursed, lights go out every 10 seconds! 

Use the time you have while you can see wisely, because you need your spatial awareness when it's dark. The tomb contains all sorts of dangers you don't want to run into! And while its dark,  it's advised to keep moving around or else the mist of spirits will grow denser.

You can play the game here in the browser, or download the stand alone client below. The WebPlayer can be a little bit laggy or wonky. Use the download for the best experience. A small donation if you liked the game is appreciated. 

with kinds regards, Magus and Falien
